Title: Caliburn Micro Hello Screens WPF Built with CM 2.0.2.0
Description:
This is a WPF build of the Caliburn Micro Hello Screens sample.
I only updated it to work with the current latest CM 2.0.2.0.
HomeWiki:
This a build in WPF of the Caliburn Micro HelloScreens Sample built with the current latest CM 2.0.2.0

It was based on a conversion made here : http://caliburnmicro.codeplex.com/discussions/238918

I've only ported it to the newest CM version.
